definition: short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]/also pr. [Min2]
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas

sentences.english: In other parts of China, tea-drinking rules are different from that of gongfu tea.
sentences.chinese: 其實，大部分地區的飲茶習俗都與閩南的工夫茶不同。

sentences.english: Lee is the founder of Taiwanese students to go the famous stone craftsmen.
sentences.chinese: 創始人李走生是閩南著名的石雕工藝師。

sentences.english: The formation of the Fulao people of South Fujian can be divided into two periods-the Dongjin—Tang period and the Song dynasty period.
sentences.chinese: 閩南福佬人的形成分爲東晉至唐和宋代兩個時期。

sentences.english: The official languages of Taipei Atrium Toastmasters Club are English and Taiwanese.
sentences.chinese: 臺北在行演講會的會議語言是英語與閩南語。

sentences.english: The Cai's lacquer engravings reminiscently remain the unique folk art in southern Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 漆線雕完整地保留閩南獨特的民間藝術特色。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is the transcription of some idioms and ballads in Klang Minnan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 巴生閩南話繼承了中國閩南方言的方言特徵。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is the transcription of some idioms and ballads in Klang Minnan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 巴生閩南話繼承了中國閩南方言的方言特徵。

sentences.english: In the southern region, dragon boat is usually a natural village of public property.
sentences.chinese: 在閩南地區，龍舟通常是某個自然村的公共財產。

sentences.english: The structural properties of this soft clay are evaluated by the sensitivity test.
sentences.chinese: 文中通過靈敏度試驗，評價閩南地區軟粘土的結構性。

sentences.english: The Minnan District has a long history of vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 閩南地區確實有悠久的素食歷史。

sentences.english: Who is going to inference Minnan dialect region consumers?
sentences.chinese: 誰來影響閩南語區域的消費者？

sentences.english: Minnan cabbage plumule's pickling methods and its soaking technique with soy sauce are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹閩南菜心的醃製和醬油漬加工技術。

sentences.english: Modern Teochew evolved from the more archaic Min-Nan.
sentences.chinese: 現代的潮語系由古閩南語所演化而成。

sentences.english: In Southern Min languages, such as Teochew, prenasalized stops are also found.
sentences.chinese: 在閩南語裏，比如潮州方言，同樣有鼻冠塞音的存在。

sentences.english: The anti-malaria measures are appropriate and effective and malaria has been controlled in southern Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 閩南地區採取的抗瘧措施得當，瘧疾流行已有效控制。

definition: Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas

Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]/also pr. [Min2]
Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
south of the five ranges/old term for south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi
